Headline: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier obstrucion near Oakton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Dempster-Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier obstrucion near Oakton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Talman
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western & 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Talman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, then resume their normal on 103rd, due to street blockage near 103rd/Talman.

Allow extra travel time.
